title: Frames on the Elephant's Nose
description:
Why couldn't @Jonathan Pageau seem to connect with @Rationality Rules and @ADAM FRIENDED? 

We do not see the world directly. We see it through frames. But that framing language is relatively new. How can we see the frames we see the world through? 

Jonathan Pageau and Sargon of Akkad
Pageau and Rationality Rules Stephen Woodford https://youtu.be/CsqVRauiAn4
Pageau and Adam Friended https://youtu.be/JLJd1-tRpiY
RR Crying Game Moment https://youtu.be/QK7u6d5c6kk
RR and IDW Protocol https://youtu.be/mgalVsc-LRs
Adam Friended and Pageau https://youtu.be/3FjiVY7nqec
Mary Kochan Parabolic Knowledge https://youtu.be/rM8BHpOaKDA
Clifford Geertz Local Knowledge https://amzn.to/36U7GxF
Peter Brown Through the Eye of the Needle https://amzn.to/3glkaRY
Tom Holland Did Religion Exist https://youtu.be/ZeCTC_r4vMI
Jordan Peterson One Last Question https://youtu.be/afSQZweYDts
The Great Puzzle https://youtu.be/Cy3CK66AyUg
How Any Idiot Can Memorize Philosophy Paul Maxwell https://youtu.be/G5i2y5w8Dzc
The Life You've Always Wanted https://amzn.to/2K5G7IM
Shantung Compound https://amzn.to/37N0Qcr
Jonathan Pageau, Bret Weinstein, Jonathan Pageau https://youtu.be/0cLLFSdKZLI
CS Lewis Miracles https://amzn.to/2LgRApo
